About me

Hi everyone! So, you've already known that my name is Maxim. I'm a third-year student of Ivanovo State Power University. I'm studying software engineering. Why did I choose programming? it’s as clear as day - firstly, I like it! Secondly, in a dynamically developing modern world, programming is considered the profession of the future. Thirdly, this profession allows to provide me and my family, and finally, my dream‘ll come true: life without limitations. Nowadays I‘m working with website layouts, design, and frontend development. I want to become a professional frontend developer and achieve heights in programming. Why should you choose me? I approach to any order with great responsibility, I have a systematic approach to my job, and I fully understand the importance of each project for the employer, the costumer and for me. Believe me, you’ll get the highest results of your projects working with me. If you are interested in me, I’ll leave my contacts below. Hoping for our future cooperation, Rubtsov Maxim.
